About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I am experienced with React Native, Ruby on Rails and JavaScript, all of which I frequently use to develop web and mobile applications.
I am also proficient in many other languages, such as Git, HTML, CSS, Sass, jQuery, and AngularJS. And, I have experience deploying GitHub for optimal workflow integration, and using computing platforms such as Heroku and Digital Ocean to launch apps and test ideas.
Lastly, post-deployment, I provide Site Reliability Engineering ("SRE") to monitor, test, and continuously improve developed software

I Specialize in

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Communication with the whole team is imporant!

2

Brainstorming Concept

Generation of ideas and selection of task specific tools to complete any project succesfully.

3

UI/UX Planning

Low, Mid and High fidelity wireframing and Interaction mapping to streamline the usage process.

4

Interaction

Easy to use and understand web interfaces.
